name: electron_project
description: BracketBuddy is the best desktop bracket management app.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd src-react && npm run dev" "tsc --watch" "tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json --watch" "wait-on ./build-electron/src-electron/main.js && electronmon --watch ./build-electron/src-electron/main.js"
scripts.build: cd src-react && npm run build && cd .. && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json && npx electron ./build-electron/main.js

author: Yusef Wilson
